page.title: 11Life in Saighton(2).
page.content: Generally people live a very quiet life but monthly in the village hall there is a Women's Institute meeting & also Bingo.The hall is also rented eg.for children's parties,to pay for its upkeep & the village pays the owner a small rent for its use.The nearest doctors are at Chester & Tattenhall (4 & 6 miles away) but an ambulance calls to take patients to various therapies in Chester.The nearest police station & shopping centre are 3 miles away at Waverton which is on the Chester bus route but as there are only 7 daily buses, without a car,travel can be a problem. 3 roads from Saighton give access to Chester, Waverton & Wrexham.Once a fortnight a mobile library comes from Chester & there are some comments that the books on the van are not changed frequently enough.
